content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the price of the apartment. Can you please tell me the monthly rental price?

If you have any questions, feel free to ask me. I am here to help.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I apologize, but I am unable to provide you with the monthly rental price of the apartment at this time. I am currently in the process of determining the best rental price for the property, and I am taking into consideration various factors such as the location, size, and condition of the apartment. May I ask what your budget is for monthly rent? This will help me better understand your needs and provide you with a more accurate rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 600 Euros per month.

If you have any other questions, please let me know. I am here to help.

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for providing me with your budget, Emilia. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price of the apartment. I am confident that we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial for both of us. May I ask if you have any other questions or concerns about the apartment or the rental process?
name: Heinrich Heine
